title: In the Arabic, “friend of God” is written as “Khalīl Allah” (‫ )خليل الل ه‬which is a Qurʾānic expression. See, e.g. Sūrat al-Nisā’ 4:125. The expression “friend of God” is also applied to Abraham in both the Old and New Testaments
